mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO BOARD VALUES ( BOARDSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bd_title}, #{bd_content}, SYSDATE, NULL, 0, #{bd_writerip}, 7, ${m_no}) INTO PORTFOLIO VALUES ( BOARDSEQ.CURRVAL, #{port_prize}, #{port_develop}, #{port_link}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT B.BD_NO, P.PORT_DEVELOP, P.PORT_LINK, P.PORT_PRIZE, DECODE(RE.REPLYCOUNT,NULL,0,RE.REPLYCOUNT) BD_REPLYCOUNT, B.BD_VIEWCOUNT, DECODE(BR.RECOMMANDCOUNT,NULL,0,BR.RECOMMANDCOUNT) BD_RECOMMANDCOUNT, M.M_IMG_PATH, M.M_IMG,M.M_NICKNAME,B.BD_CREATEDDATE FROM BOARD B, PORTFOLIO P, IT_MEMBER M , (SELECT BD_NO,COUNT(BD_NO) REPLYCOUNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY BD_NO) RE, (SELECT BD_NO,COUNT(BD_NO) RECOMMANDCOUNT FROM BOARDRECOMMAND GROUP BY BD_NO) BR WHERE B.BD_NO = P.BD_NO AND B.BC_CODE=7 AND B.M_NO = M.M_NO AND RE.BD_NO(+) = B.BD_NO AND BR.BD_NO(+) = B.BD_NO ORDER BY B.BD_CREATEDDATE DESC, B.BD_NO DESC) A ORDER BY RN ASC) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT M.M_NO, M.M_IMG_PATH, M.M_IMG, M.M_NICKNAME, B.BD_CREATEDDATE, B.BD_MODIFYDATE, B.BD_WRITERIP, B.BD_NO, B.BD_TITLE, B.BD_CONTENT, (SELECT COUNT(BD_NO) FROM BOARDRECOMMAND R WHERE R.BD_NO=${bd_no}) BD_RECOMMANDCOUNT, P.PORT_DEVELOP, P.PORT_LINK, P.PORT_PRIZE FROM BOARD B, PORTFOLIO P, IT_MEMBER M WHERE B.BD_NO = P.BD_NO AND B.M_NO = M.M_NO AND B.BD_NO = #{bd_no}
SELECT COUNT(BD_NO) FROM BOARD WHERE BC_CODE=7
